metadata.title: CVE-2021-28210 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An unlimited recursion in DxeCore in EDK II.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28210` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.3+esm2
qemu-efi - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.3+esm2
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.3+esm2
qemu-efi-arm - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.3+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: edk2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.3+esm2').
